channel.title: Titlebox and button request, i have a background to blend with =D
channel.description:
[img]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u116/the_owner2007/Background.png[/img]
I made that, i know it sucks, but it goes with my JFrame on client. I only have fireworks, and i have no idea how to make transparent images or anything, if anyone could make me a titlebox and titlebutton to go with that background i will be very thankful.

item.title: Titlebox and button request, i have a background to blend with =D
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Sorry everyone;

This is what i mean by titlebox and title button;

TITLEBUTTON

TITLEBOX

I just need one made, sqaure, or rounded corners etc. Just that goes with the background, like a grey texture or something,i don’t really know how to make good images.

item.title: Titlebox and button request, i have a background to blend with =D
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

When you say a “titlebox and titlebutton” do you mean the border at the top of the window with the minimize/maximize/close buttons? You won’t be able to replace that, using Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Titlebox and button request, i have a background to blend with =D
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Be more descriptive of what you would like. What is the theme that these images are supposed to go along with? What purpose will they serve? That background is very basic and I can’t do much of anything at all with it as a base. If you have some sort of color palette in mind please do share.

Read full topic
